translations: n.趋同；汇集，相交；会聚区；收敛（性）

phrs.translation: 算法收敛；演算法收敛性
收敛性判定准则；收敛性判据
绝对收敛；[数学]绝对收敛性

sentences.sentence: A survey conducted earlier this year shows how this convergence on similar types of work has blurred class boundaries.
sentences.translation: 今年早些时候进行的一项调查显示，类似工作类型的趋同是如何模糊了阶级界限的。

sentences.sentence: The difference in regular red-wine consumption has been narrowing, but no similar convergence in heart-disease rates has occurred.
sentences.translation: 在定期饮用红酒方面的差异正在缩小，但在心脏病发病率方面没有出现类似的趋同现象。

sentences.sentence: The series converges uniformly on compact subsets of the interior of the annulus of convergence.
sentences.translation: 该级数一致收敛于收敛环内的紧子集上。
